channel.title: Vote4cash Help
channel.description:
[ul]Since i've seen many servers with a pro vote4cash system , i decided to do like them cause this might attracts the players and help me to get more players.
after buying a domain and a webhosting i became a ready for the project.
1) i would like to start with that system like: [list] [li]Players have to vote on all the links and if he tried to press continue without voting atlest one of them , he would see warning. [/li] [/list] http://i42.tinypic.com/53k38z.png
2)Since player been voted in all the links he would move to another page. [list] [li]As you see guys , player has to choose witch reward he wants after voting at all.[/li][/list] Edit:Its not important what is the reward. so the rewards below are not necessary. http://i40.tinypic.com/25z1krn.png
3)The last setup: [list] [li]The player would move automatically to new page again , and see a proof that a voteing outside the cilent has complated. [/li] [/list] http://i44.tinypic.com/2j0h5xx.png
Finally i finished explaining about the system that i could run it on my server.
but still a one setup that important too: If player tried to vote again without waiting time he could't success, immediately will face a warning that he voted in the last 24 hour. http://i42.tinypic.com/2nggzfk.png
Finally i finish all my description what i exactly want. I hope to give me 5 mins of yourtime to give me some instruction and information, btw dont forget i've knew that system needs webhosting and a domain and i do.
Best of regards: Hatem.[/ul]

item.title: Vote4cash Help
item.dc:creator: @hatem hatem
item.description:
@hatem wrote:

[quote=“Pkor159, post:4, topic:528546”]You see the icon at the corner. I think they make such Vote4Cash system. I don’t really know :3
Edit - You won’t get pro systems for free.[/quote]

What do you mean i won’t it free ? , i have to face someone to help me with this :palm:?conversely i have to pay for him ?.
Absolutely No , i made the topic at help section and their selling and buying are not allowed that means that i want someone help me with for free.

Edit: Pro system isn’t less than 15$. And i wont do.
Edit:Any way i thankful for you for helping.

sk8rdude461:

http://www.rune-server.org/programming/website-development/tutorials/450957-rsps-gtlvote-v1-0-new-voting-script.html

Yea i’ve faced this tut too and it helps me.
Thank you for helping.

[quote=“JDETSC, post:6, topic:528546”][code=java]
@Override
public void vote4cash() {
int vote, finish;

while(vote>finish) {
System.out.print(c.playerName+ “has just voted!”);
vote += 1;
}[/code][/quote]

I don’t even know what this code helps me with?.
Edit: I want to follow all the tut from the same place.
Edit:Thanks for helping.

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:9, topic:528546”][quote author=JDETSC link=topic=647299.msg4353386#msg4353386 date=1377041234]
GG, never finished.
[/quote]
GG you’re shitty at writing code.[/quote]
Please do not spam at my topic i dont wish to be locked , i hope to accept my opinion.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461

GG, never finished.

item.title: Vote4cash Help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“JDETSC, post:6, topic:528546”][code=java]
@Override
public void vote4cash() {
int vote, finish;

while(vote>finish) {
System.out.print(c.playerName+ “has just voted!”);
vote += 1;
}[/code][/quote]
Oh look.
while vote is greater than finish, add one. Weird it won’t get to that because you never declare vote higher than finish, and then afterwards that while loop would never stop. GG.

Read full topic

I think this tutorial include all those stuff you were asking about, Not sure thought.[/quote]

I’ve faced that tut before ,unfortunately its doesn’t help me as i described.

Edit: thats tut supports the lower vote4cash system but i want the pro.

Read full topic
